revision.text: Possibly: Anecdotes of the life of the Right Honourable William Pitt, Earl of Chatham; and of the principal events of his time: with his speeches in Parliament, from the year 1736 to the year 1778. In three volumes. (By John Almon). (London : Printed for J.S. Jordan, No. 166, Fleet-Street, MDCCXCIII. [1793]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2432565~S1
